Main Content Region



Student Life









Welcome
Welcome to student life on the CSUSB Palm Desert Campus! Our programs and activities support the university’s mission helping students become engaged in the life of the campus, connected to others of diverse backgrounds and cultures and active in programs and events that encourage personal growth, intellectual curiosity and academic success. We encourage everyone to explore what PDC has to offer!
